field.name: RNPP
field.description: RXNP array (inbound non-posted requests FIFO) parity error. When set, indicates that the parity error was detected on array's read port.

field.name: RPCP
field.description: RXPC array (inbound posted requests FIFO) parity error. When set, indicates that the parity error was detected on array's read port.

field.name: RCIP
field.description: RXCIF array (Received completions indications FIFO) parity error. When set, indicates that the parity error was detected on array's read port.

field.name: RCCP
field.description: Receive completions control arrays parity error. When set, indicates that the parity error was detected on array's read port.

field.name: RFTP
field.description: RXFT array (inbound read tags queue array) parity error. When set, indicates that the parity error was detected on array's read port.
